Title: Establishes the garden protection act
Summary: Establishes the "garden protection act", protecting the rights of individuals to cultivate home vegetable gardens, native plant gardens, and/or pollinator gardens.
LawCode: Amd Art 2-C Art Head, ยง31-g, add ยง31-k, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the "garden protection act"
